description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework project, including event handling and category management.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning events, including serialization, categorization, and warning checks.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for managing warning reporting units, including reporting warnings and category management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Interface for control over warning categories, allowing exclusion and configuration.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Exclude the specified category from reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configure the warning reporting control with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Create a copy of the warning reporting control instance.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Report a warning event associated with an identifier.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieve information about a specific warning category.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Add a warning reporting control to a category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Remove a warning reporting control from a category list.
